BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
The new screen is showing the documents connected to the PO lines (part and nopart) and PO header.
The following documents are not shown:
-	Documents linked by object transformation
-	Documents connected to the components (direct or indirect (transformation)) of a manufactured part.

These types of documents need to be added in the new created screen.

See attached spec

Title__c: BQA-10305 Therma Projects Summary Lobby - "Projects to Update" Tile layout
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:
This Jira should address following 2 points,
1) Validation of “Planned Cost” source in “Projects to Update” tile in Therma Projects Summary Lobby. As per @Michael Oshaughnessy this should ideally pull data from “Project Definition” > “Margin” tab > “Plan
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
This Jira should address following 2 points,
1) Validation of “Planned Cost” source in “Projects to Update” tile in Therma Projects Summary Lobby. As per @Michael Oshaughnessy this should ideally pull data from “Project Definition” > “Margin” tab > “Planned Cost” and should not in any way refer to the “Planned Cost” in the Project Monitoring page which is equivalent to the “Estimated Cost” in Legence case, since the “Planned Cost Driver” is Estimated Cost. 
 
  a) Functional Validation - @Sachitha DeSilva 
  b) Technical Validation - @Matt Conk 

2) Adjust the layout of the “Projects to Update” tile in Therma Projects Summary Lobby, so that two columns displayed are easy to read with some space in between.

Title__c: BQA-10255 Create IFS Trial Balance Report
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c: We would like to be able to run a trial balance report in IFS that exports to Excel. See business requirements below for specifications. See also attached example file for how we would like the report to look.
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
As as IFS Finance Business User

I want to execute a standard general ledger trial balance report

So that I can easily see balances in the general ledger.

This report provides the Finance Team a standard format to report general ledger balances.   Additionally,  this report is expected to perform more efficiently than running various queries directly from IFS.

Title__c: BQA-10187 Auto-update Planned Cost on project if less than Actual Cost
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:

Stop-gap is “Projects-to-Update” element on Projects Summary Lobby so PMs can manually update, as per BQA-101

 already addressed the revenue recognition problem.

Project Managers need a way
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
Description

BQA-9342: CRIM: Auto-update Planned/Estimated Cost on Project if less than Actual Cost [for Revenue Recognition]
CLOSED
 already addressed the revenue recognition problem.  

Business Requirements Overview

Project Managers need a way to quickly identify which projects that fall into the bucket of actual cost exceeding planned/estimated cost. Otherwise, it is like a black box and becomes a manual fact finding mission. This is required post go-live.

BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:
Several minor changes/fixes, not initially outlined in the FDD, are needed to be made to the Location CRIM (BQA-9434).  They are as defined below:

 

Inactivate Message Change

Change the message when inactivating a location connected to other loca
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
Several minor changes/fixes, not initially outlined in the FDD, are needed to be made to the Location CRIM (BQA-9434).  They are as defined below:

 

Inactivate Message Change

Change the message when inactivating a location connected to other locations to:
”This Location is connected to other locations. Do you want to inactivate this Location?”

Parent Toggle Message Change

Change the message when changing the parent status of a location to:
”This Location is connected to other locations. Do you want to change the parent status?”

Adding fields to Location/Opportunity Tab
